title: Can never stay connected to games.
body: I connect initially, play for a little while, then minions freeze. A minute later, "Attempting to Reconnect" error message. after reconnecting to my internet multiple times to remedy the problem, it happens again. I reconnect manually to the game. Same problem. Note: League is the only game to which I lag out to this extent. My ISP is Charter Spectrum. But it seems that no matter what application I use (Haste, WTFast, etc.) I still lag out, despite my internet connection being fine. If ANYONE has any possible solutions, they would be VERY greatly appreciated. Please help!!

replies.body:
It sounds like your network is just having a difficult time getting a stable connection with our game servers. This doesn't mean that your own home internet is bad per se, but just that something is making it hard for your network to _keep_ that connection.

Let's cover the most usual causes by going through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know how that works!

I've literally done everything on your troubleshooting guide except for port forwarding, because it's a family router, but the likeliness of my router ports causing my issue would be unlikely I think. Any other suggestions?

No worries! That guide is a good starting point for the most common connection issues, and it also helps us to narrow down what might be the main problem. Since those steps haven't seemed to help so far, let's get you a little more one on one help. 

Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll be able to look much deeper for you there!
